landing.mainTitle: Free lifestyle universe for home and leisure
landing.subtitle: Meeting place for skilled suppliers to the home.
landing.description: Craftsmen, advisors, kitchen brands, lifestyle products and much more. We have gathered a wide range of the most important suppliers for the home, and present them all through short profile videos, Trustpilot reviews and easily digestible descriptions. As a home interested person, you can thus in an intuitive way with just a few clicks find products and services among our partners, and it is our hope that we thereby make the often somewhat challenging exercise of finding good and trustworthy help completely simple and safe. We have namely selected and reviewed each individual partner ourselves. Welcome to Boligmatch+.
landing.transparentJourney: Transparent home journey at a whole new level.
landing.futureDescription: In the future, you as a customer at Boligmatch will also be able to follow your purchase or sales process step by step in an intuitive way on the Boligmatch+ platform. Here you get a clear overview of all steps, activities and tasks, so you always know where you are in the process. In addition, we come with some benefits that have not been seen before in the industry. Sign up for free as a user on Boligmatch+ here - so you can already today get started searching for suppliers, and at the same time automatically keep yourself updated on the upcoming benefits.

signup.title: Create yourself as a user
signup.passwordRequirements: Use at least 6 characters (distinguishing between uppercase and lowercase letters) with at least one number or special character.
signup.termsText1: By creating yourself as a user on Boligmatch+, you accept that Boligmatch may contact you about buying, selling and advising on housing transactions via email, and send newsletters with offers and benefits
signup.termsText2: You also accept our terms and conditions for storage and processing of data
signup.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

recommendModal.title: Recommend us to others
recommendModal.description: Do you think a friend could use our service? Send them a message here

contactModal.title: Contact us
contactModal.description: Send us a short description of your project. We will contact you as soon as possible for a non-binding chat. We look forward to helping you.
contactModal.subject: Subject

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.description: Expert advice and professional consulting services

physical.label: Physical assessment and documentation
physical.description: Our team conducts a thorough evaluation of your property, documenting every detail to prepare for sale.

photography.label: Photography and description
photography.description: Professional photos and detailed descriptions showcase your property in the best light.

viewing.label: For sale, open house and viewings
viewing.description: We organize and manage property viewings and open house events to attract potential buyers.

negotiation.label: Offer and negotiation
negotiation.description: Expert handling of offers and negotiations to secure the best possible deal for you.

signing.label: Signing by buyer and seller
signing.description: Finalizing the agreement with all parties signing the necessary documents.

approval.label: Bank and advisor approval
approval.description: Securing necessary approvals from financial institutions and legal advisors.

final.label: Final transaction and registration
final.description: Completing the legal transaction and registering the property transfer.

transfer.label: Transfer and follow-up
transfer.description: Handing over the property to the new owner and ensuring all details are finalized.
